article.title: CTA Awarded Contract to Support Navy's Airborne Threat Simulation Organization
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Computer Technology Associates (CTA) Incorporated is being awarded a $6.5 million indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract for 609 electronic assemblies and the associated engineering and technical support as well as repair services. This effort is in support of the U.S. Navy's Airborne Threat Simulation Organization.
